participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and stylish, Jordan is driven by his passion for luxury and a desire for acceptance.
participant_1.background: my family doesn't support my career choices. i currently work for a watch dealer. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Confident and highly motivated, Samantha is focused on her career in finance and values her education and background.
participant_2.background: i grew up in manhattan. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year.
